title: Death Valley National Park
description: In December 2012 my family took a trip to Death Valley.

photos.description: A cool wavy shadow on some rocks.
photos.alt: A shadow along the base of a small valley between wavy rocks.

photos.description: Some more wavy rocks. I guess it's probably wind that does that.
photos.alt: A wide view of many wavy rocks in the foreground with desert and mountains in the background.
A raven sitting on a rock looking into the camera.

photos.description: Some very bumpy rocks/mud/salt. I like how flat it seems from a distance.
photos.alt: Densely packed bumpy rocks spreading off into the distance in a flat field that leads into mountains.

photos.description: Some tracks in the snow. I don't remember where exactly this was, but I think it was at a higher elevation than the rest of the trip.
photos.alt: Tracks in the snow winding towards the camera.
